snippet: The town of Iten, Kenya, which is in the Great Rift Valley, 8,000 feet above sea level, has become a training ground for elite marathon runners.
abstract: Iten, Kenya, which is in the Great Rift Valley, 8,000 feet above sea level, is increasingly gaining international recognition as the world's foremost manufacturer of elite middle- and long-distance running talent.
lead_paragraph: The town of Iten, Kenya, which is in the Great Rift Valley, 8,000 feet above sea level, has become a training ground for elite marathon runners.

headline.seo: Iten, a Kenyan Town Made for Marathoners
headline.main: Paths to the Marathon in a Small Kenyan Town
headline.print_headline: Paths to Marathon In Small Kenyan Town
